plot: The family drama really heats up when Kris comes to visit Kourtney in Miami and starts meddling in her relationship with Scott. Kris feels it's her motherly duty to tell Scott to stay away from Kourtney and Mason, but will her plan backfire and push Kourtney to reconcile with Scott instead? Meanwhile, Khloé returns to Miami to help out Kourtney, but she finds out that firing an employee is hard to do when she has to let one of the Dash dolls go.—Guilherme O.
